      • getInstance

        public static GLText getInstance​(RenderContext ctx,
                                 MapTextFormat textFormat)
        Returns an instance of the requested GLText; creates it if it hasn't already. Initializes all the font metrics so that the getters work immediately.
        Returns:
        a specified GLText instance; never null

      • draw

        public void draw​(java.lang.String text,
                 float r,
                 float g,
                 float b,
                 float a)
        Draws the specified string in the current GL context.
        Parameters:
        text - The text
        r - The red color component for the text
        g - The green color component for the text
        b - The blue color component for the text
        a - The alpha color component for the text

      • draw

        public void draw​(java.lang.String text,
                 float r,
                 float g,
                 float b,
                 float a,
                 float scissorX0,
                 float scissorX1)
        Draws the specified string in the current GL context. A scissor region may be specified whereby any content outside of the region is not rendered. Partial characters may be rendered.
        Parameters:
        text - The text
        r - The red color component for the text
        g - The green color component for the text
        b - The blue color component for the text
        a - The alpha color component for the text
        scissorX0 - The pixel offset, relative to the start of the string, to begin the scissor
        scissorX1 - The pixel offset, relative to the start of the string, to end the scissor

      • batch

        public void batch​(GLRenderBatch2 batch,
                  java.lang.String text,
                  float x,
                  float y,

                  float r,

      • batch

        public void batch​(GLRenderBatch batch,
                  java.lang.String text,
                  float x,
                  float y,
                  float r,
                  float g,
                  float b,
                  float a,
                  float scissorX0,
                  float scissorX1)
        Batches the specified string. A scissor region may be specified whereby any content outside of the region is not batched. Partial characters may be batched.
        Parameters:
        batch - The batch
        text - The text
        x - The x location of the text
        y - The y location of the text
        r - The red color component for the text
        g - The green color component for the text
        b - The blue color component for the text
        a - The alpha color component for the text
        scissorX0 - The pixel offset, relative to the start of the string, to begin the scissor
        scissorX1 - The pixel offset, relative to the start of the string, to end the scissor
